name: Class X509EncodedKeySpec
text:
This class represents the ASN.1 encoding of a public key,
 encoded according to the ASN.1 type SubjectPublicKeyInfo.
 The SubjectPublicKeyInfo syntax is defined in the X.509
 standard as follows:

 
 SubjectPublicKeyInfo ::= SEQUENCE {
   algorithm AlgorithmIdentifier,
   subjectPublicKey BIT STRING }

methods.description: Returns the key bytes, encoded according to the X.509 standard.

Returns the name of the encoding format associated with this
 key specification.
